summary: Timeline_2 follows a journey through PTSD treatment with increasing use of coping strategies.

posts.text: I feel like such a failure. I'm a burden to everyone Can't stop thinking about hurting myself. I'm failing at everything But I remembered my safety plan tried a new coping mechanism and texted my sponsor. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel so alone. I hate myself so much Nobody understands what I'm going through. I stopped taking my medication Decided to join a support group. did some self-care activities Met some people who actually get it. Things can get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feeling hopeful for the first time in months. reached out for help Small steps are still progress Had a bad moment yesterday. Life is meaningless But I worked through it using my tools. Small steps are still progress
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: Haven't left my apartment in days. I'm a burden to everyone I isolated myself from all my friends Forced myself to go for a walk today set healthy boundaries and called my sister. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Haven't left my apartment in days. I hate myself so much I'm spiraling out of control Forced myself to go for a walk today wrote in my journal and called my sister. Small steps are still progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Side effects are awful. I'm tired of existing I hurt myself again Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. took my medication as prescribed Noticing small improvements in my mood. I deserve to get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The depression is getting worse. I'm broken beyond repair I isolated myself from all my friends I know I need help so I wrote in my journal My therapist suggested I acknowledge my progress
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I don't deserve to be loved. I can't do anything right I isolated myself from all my friends My partner has been incredibly supportive. joined a support group Learning to accept help and love. Small steps are still progress
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The depression is getting worse. Life is meaningless I don't care about anything anymore I know I need help so I joined a support group My therapist suggested Things can get better
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I'm disgusting I gave up trying Managed to shower and eat breakfast. joined a support group Small steps are still steps forward. I'm being patient with myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Starting to see the light at the end of the tunnel. set healthy boundaries Therapy is really helping. I'm proud of myself for trying Still have rough days. I hate myself so much But they're getting less frequent. I can't get out of bed anymore
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I'm tired of existing I can't get out of bed anymore Managed to shower and eat breakfast. went for a walk to clear my head Small steps are still steps forward. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
I'm learning to be kinder to myself

posts.text: Can't handle the pressure anymore. I'm worthless and pathetic I've been having suicidal thoughts Started setting better boundaries at work. started going to therapy Learned to say no to extra projects. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I'm broken beyond repair I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I hurt myself again But I've been practicing the breathing exercises asked for support and it's starting to help. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
